briefTitle: Research Evaluating an Investigational Medication for Erectile Dysfunction - Post-Prostatectomy

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Percentage of Sexual Attempts in Which Subjects Are Able to Maintain an Erection of Sufficient Duration to Have Successful Intercourse
outcomeMeasures.description: Data presented as mean change from baseline in the percentage of Yes responses to Sexual Encounter Profile (SEP) diary question 3 "Did your erection last long enough for you to have successful intercourse?"

outcomeMeasures.title: The Change in Percentage of Sexual Attempts in Which Subjects Are Able to Insert the Penis Into the Partner's Vagina
outcomeMeasures.description: Data presented as mean change from baseline in the percentage of Yes responses to Sexual Encounter Profile (SEP) diary question 2 "Were you able to insert your penis into your partner's vagina?"

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in International Index of Erectile Function - Erectile Function Domain (IIEF-EF) Score
outcomeMeasures.description: Questionnaire assesses subject's evaluation of erectile function over the previous 4-week period. Total scores from questions 1-5 \& 15 range from 1 to 30. A higher score indicates better erectile function.
